author: pbs.org
title: Video: Phil Tries: Slicing Ham | Watch I'll Have What Phil's Having Online | PBS Video
text: Phil visits Vila Viniteca in Barcelona for a lesson in all things jamon–Spain’s most prized culinary export. Under the watchful eye of Catalan jamon experts Frank Manjavagas and Maxime LeBron, Phil attemps to slice the ham himself
